scripts.start: yarn run build:clean && yarn run version:dev && yarn runall:dev
scripts.start:prod: yarn run build:clean && yarn run version:prod && npm run nra -- -p build:watch:prod graph:build:watch:prod
scripts.build:clean: bash scripts/dbux-run-all.sh "rm -rf dist" && cd dbux-code && yarn run build:clean
scripts.build:watch___: yarn run version:dev && npx nodemon --exec "node --stack-trace-limit=1000 -- ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode development --watch"
scripts.build:watch:prod___: yarn run version:prod && npx nodemon --exec "node --stack-trace-limit=1000 -- ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production --watch"
scripts.build:dev: yarn run version:dev && yarn run build:clean && yarn run graph:build:dev && node --stack-trace-limit=1000 -- ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode development
scripts.build:prod: yarn run version:prod && yarn run build:clean && yarn run graph:build:prod && node --stack-trace-limit=1000 -- ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production
scripts.i: npx lerna bootstrap --force-local && npx lerna link --force-local
scripts.force-reinstall: yarn run force-uninstall && yarn install && yarn i
scripts.force-uninstall: yarn run build:clean && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -f ./package-lock.json && rm -f yarn.lock && bash scripts/dbux-run-all.sh "rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -f ./package-lock.json && rm -f yarn.lock"
scripts.clinic: clinic flame -- node dbux-cli/bin/run-js-unbabel ../samples/__samplesOutput__/oop1.es5.js || (echo "\033[1;31mCould not execute clinic - checking installed version:\033[0m" && clinic -v)
scripts.cloc-eslint: cd dbux_projects/eslint && volta run --node lts npx cloc --match-f=".*\.(e?js|ts)$" --by-file lib bin tests templates packages
scripts.cloc-express: cd dbux_projects/express && volta run --node lts npx cloc --match-f=".*\.(e?js|ts)$" --by-file lib bin test
scripts.code:install: cd dbux-code && yarn run package-no-build && yarn run reinstallself
scripts.code:install:prod: yarn run build:prod && yarn run code:install
scripts.code:install:dev: yarn run build:dev && yarn run code:install
scripts.zzfixme__code:analyze: node --trace-deprecation ../node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --mode production --profile --json > dist/stats.json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.json
scripts.zz-bash-warning: echo 'WARNING: Make sure your shell is set to bash. Check https://bit.ly/3i2S8KE for how to set it up on Windows.'
scripts.shapez-run: yarn && cd gulp && yarn && yarn gulp
scripts.shapez-install: git clone https://github.com/tobspr/shapez.io.git && cd shapez.io && git lfs pull && yarn && cd gulp && yarn && yarn gulp `# TODO: also install git-lfs + ffmpeg, see: https://github.com/tobspr/shapez.io/tree/master/.travis.yml`
